answers.answer: Hi,Thanks for writing in.These symptoms can be due to excessive anxiety and stress.Have you been unduly anxious or stressed out lately?At the same time it is important to rule out migraine, sinusitis, disc herniation in the neck and lower back.I would suggest you to also to get checked for diabetes. Please schedule an appointment with your PCP and undergo complete clinical exam.Hope this helps!

question: Please help me.  I am only 26 and I don't know what's happening to me.  I have been having scalp pain, migraines/throbbing headaches/squeezing, pain behind my eyes, twitching of eye muscles/nerves when eyes are shut, vision problems such as ghost shadowing around people and objects, hair loss, can't gain weight, constant back and neck pain, fevers, thirsty, and mood swings.  I had my thyroid checked, but the results came back normal.  I'm not sure what else it could be.  If you have any ideas, please let me know.Thank you very much!
title: Unknown cause of symptoms
